A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is really too much to say that is wrong including the fact that they changed the philosophy behind the force and all sorts of things. The First Order is not scary... it's laughable and led by idiots. The opening scene lost me. But ultimately it felt more like a bad Star Trek spin-off than Star Wars. Rian Johnson admitted that he has never read any of the broader Star Wars lore and it showed. It simply wasn't Star Wars.
